ygData.subject: RE: Song Taunt
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I got slammed last night guk, npcs b-lined straight for me. Then again, I don t have many problems with bard hate anymore; they all went away after L46 or
ygData.messageBody:
> I did notice a slight difference in the fact that mobs don't go straight
> for me if I'm playing a song. Not sure if this is just a coincidence.

I got slammed last night guk, npcs b-lined straight for me.
Then again, I don't have many problems with bard hate anymore;
they all went away after L46 or so. I think that warriors taunt
better, enchanter crowd control better, etc. and this is why
bard hate isn't a big issue late in the bard's life. However,
if two clerics of innoruuk, a handful of spite golems, and the
occansional banshee decide to crash the party, I'm the first
one popping back at my bind point. <g> Same with ice giants in
permafrost: 2/3 giants, 2 spiders, and toss in a bear or terror
and you've just killed your bard. hehe.

> Ps, Got 2 Runed mithril bracers last night. Would I be able to trade these
> and a Runed Falchion for a Ykesha??

Probably not. I would venture to guess that (and without saying
prices which fluctuate from server to server) both RMBs would most
likely be equivalent to half the worth of a falchion. And maybe
a fourth the equivalence of a Yak. I'm just guessing, since people
rate their own worth on items and it varies person to person.

Harmonic.
